imdb.plot outline: Four episodes factual series about the military special forces that fight against one of the main criminal organization of the world, the Calabrian 'Ndrangheta. In the summer of 2017, the documentary crew was embedded with the military in their daily work. The Hunters are divided in small units called "Falcons", they are like brother, moving independently from night to day and trying to be not seen by the population. They fight an enemy so big to be invisible. They have two main tasks: seek and destroy the hemp plantations spread throughout the territory and looking for the absconding men of the criminal organization. "Squadron" is a journey inside these endless researches.
imdb.title: Lo Squadrone
plot: Four episodes factual series about the military special forces that fight against one of the main criminal organization of the world, the Calabrian 'Ndrangheta. In the summer of 2017, the documentary crew was embedded with the military in their daily work. The Hunters are divided in small units called "Falcons", they are like brother, moving independently from night to day and trying to be not seen by the population. They fight an enemy so big to be invisible. They have two main tasks: seek and destroy the hemp plantations spread throughout the territory and looking for the absconding men of the criminal organization. "Squadron" is a journey inside these endless researches.::Benedetto Sanfilippo
